NewsArticle.Title: Arena Update
NewsArticle.Content:
Some changes have been made for the Arena:
1)All dark items are allowed.
2)Options for insight ranges 1-50 and 51-99 are available.
3)Coliseum Mundanes Tor, Tyr, and Tur have repair and bank options.
These updates will be available on the morning of 09/27. There will be more updates later. We are also working on other updates and areas.
DA Team
